alert.note: Alert for Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 10 at 1:17PM EST until January 10 at 11:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING HAS BEEN ALLOWED TO EXPIRED... * WHAT...Elevated water levels will recede near the waterfront and shoreline through this afternoon. * WHERE...Southwest Suffolk, Southeast Suffolk and Southern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 PM EST this evening. * COASTAL FLOOD IMPACTS...Widespread moderate flooding to major near the waterfront and shoreline along the eastern Great South Bay will slowly subside through this afternoon. * SHORELINE IMPACTS...Breaking waves of 10 to 15 ft along the oceanfront will result in beach flooding and scattered dune erosion with this evening high tide. Overwashes are not expected this evening.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
